modName: The Gray Cowl of Nocturnal - Streamlined
summary:
The portal at the Eye of Cyrodiil will take you to The Hall of the West instead.

SOMEONE HAS TO DO IT!
descriptionHtml:
Skip the entire first dungeon and place you at the hall of the west without breaking the quest or anything.
I made this mod for myself but I thought that someone may need it too..? or not lol.

If you never play this mod before, I suggest that you play it normally and ignore this mod.

Thanks for the great mod, mannygt!
Here's it :Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64651/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64651[/url]
author: LertKrush
